com.loicfrance.library.utils

Class PermissionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loicfrance.library.utils.PermissionsManager

  • public final class PermissionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Loic France on 01/10/2016. simple class with static methods to easily request permissions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermissionsManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isPermissionGranted(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String permission) 
      static void requestAllPermissions(android.app.Activity activity, int requestId)
      requests all permissions needed in your applications at once if needed, by calling the function requestPermissions(Activity, String[], int) with all not granted permissions requested by your application.
      static void requestPermissions(android.app.Activity context, java.lang.String[] permissions, int requestId)
      requests the specified permissions.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionsManager

        public PermissionsManager()

    • Method Detail

      • isPermissionGranted

        public static boolean isPermissionGranted(android.content.Context context,
                                          @NonNull
                                          java.lang.String permission)
        Parameters:
        context - the active context of the application
        permission - the permission you want to know if it has been granted or not
        Returns:
        true if the permission has been granted, false otherwise

      • requestPermissions

        public static void requestPermissions(android.app.Activity context,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                      int requestId)
        requests the specified permissions. The onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) function is called by the system once the user has made his choice
        Parameters:
        context - the active permission of the application
        permissions - the permissions you need
        requestId - the id that will be used by the system when calling the onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) function

      • requestAllPermissions

        public static void requestAllPermissions(android.app.Activity activity,
                                         int requestId)
        requests all permissions needed in your applications at once if needed, by calling the function requestPermissions(Activity, String[], int) with all not granted permissions requested by your application.
        Parameters:
        activity - the active permission of the application
        requestId - the id that will be used by the system when calling the onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) function
